description:
An incorrect path is referenced in the Nova Documentation README.  

It states the "Building the Documentation" section is in

doc/source/devref/development.environment.rst. 

Devref is a non-existent directory.  The file is actually in

doc/source/development.environment.rst.
title: incorrect path referenced in nova/doc/README.rst

comments.content:
An incorrect path is referenced in the Nova Documentation README.  

It states the "Building the Documentation" section is in

doc/source/devref/development.environment.rst. 

Devref is a non-existent directory.  The file is actually in

doc/source/development.environment.rst.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ehsu
